metadata.title: CVE-2016-2517 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: NTP before 4.2.8p7 and 4.3.x before 4.3.92 allows remote attackers to causea denial of service (prevent subsequent authentication) by leveragingknowledge of the controlkey or requestkey and sending a crafted packet tontpd, which changes the value of trustedkey, controlkey, or requestkey.NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of a CVE-2016-2516 regression.

criterions.comment: ntp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
